title: RDP clipboard not working with Server 2025
author: slowreload
body_snippet:
When connected to RDP to a server 2025 server RDP clipboard doesnt work, Not able to copy in or out. Works with all other OS Win10/11 Server16-22. Copy paste also works locally on the remote machine from within the rdp session and when using mstsc.exe just not with mremote.

## Expected Behavior
Should be able to copy in and out normally with RDP clipboard.

## Current Behavior
Clipboard is no longer shared from host or remote machine when using mRemote. Works with MSTSC.exe and can copy n...

iterations.description: Stale - RDP clipboard Server 2025, workaround confirmed (rdpclip.exe)

comments.snippet: Did you verify, that in the connection settings RDP is enabled (see https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/issues/1562#issuecomment-528502502)?
comments.author: simonai1254

comments.snippet: Yes I did. The server was originally 2016 then was in place upgraded to 2025 and it worked when it was 2016. I also tried on a fresh build and it was the same effect. I tried rolling back to the  last stable version 1.76.20 and used the same connection file with zero changes and it works as intended it is a issue with version 1.77.3
